all_signs_system.name: All Signs Spiritual Alignment Mapping
all_signs_system.purpose: Map all zodiac signs and spiritual paths - honoring all forms, all journeys
all_signs_system.mission: Faith in alignment, not control - every sign has a path, every path is valid
all_signs_system.philosophy: No two people are the same - honor all paths, all forms, all journeys

aries.core_energy: The Pioneer, The Warrior, The Initiator
aries.spiritual_gift: Courage to begin, strength to lead, fire to ignite
aries.rift_healing: The Institutional Shell Rift - breaks through barriers

taurus.core_energy: The Builder, The Stabilizer, The Ground
taurus.spiritual_gift: Patience to build, stability to anchor, earth to ground
taurus.rift_healing: The Tectonic/Border Logic Rift - builds foundations
taurus.covenant_act_strength: Heritage Reclaimed, Bridge Built - building acts
taurus.resonance_pioneer_energy: The builder who creates lasting structures

gemini.core_energy: The Communicator, The Bridge, The Twin
gemini.spiritual_gift: Communication to connect, curiosity to learn, duality to bridge
gemini.rift_healing: The Language & Tribalism Rift - bridges through communication
gemini.covenant_act_strength: Common Duygu Honored, Bridge Built - communication acts
gemini.resonance_pioneer_energy: The communicator who builds bridges between worlds

cancer.core_energy: The Nurturer, The Protector, The Home
cancer.spiritual_gift: Nurturing to heal, protection to guard, home to anchor
cancer.rift_healing: The Heritage Erasure Rift - preserves memory and home
cancer.covenant_act_strength: Shared Table, Heritage Reclaimed - nurturing acts
cancer.yin_yang_balance: Yin dominant - nurturing, protection, emotional depth
cancer.resonance_pioneer_energy: The nurturer who creates safe spaces

leo.core_energy: The Leader, The Light, The Heart
leo.spiritual_gift: Leadership to guide, light to illuminate, heart to love
leo.heritage_meridian_connection: The Central Anchor - heart of the system
leo.rift_healing: The Institutional Shell Rift - leads with heart
leo.covenant_act_strength: Meridian Activated, Rift Healed - leadership acts
leo.yin_yang_balance: Yang dominant - leadership, expression, heart-centered action
leo.resonance_pioneer_energy: The leader who leads with love

virgo.core_energy: The Healer, The Analyst, The Perfectionist
virgo.spiritual_gift: Healing to restore, analysis to understand, perfection to serve
virgo.rift_healing: The Time Meridian Rift - restores natural rhythm
virgo.covenant_act_strength: Rift Healed, Scarcity Refused - healing acts
virgo.resonance_pioneer_energy: The healer who serves through precision

libra.core_energy: The Balancer, The Diplomat, The Harmonizer
libra.spiritual_gift: Balance to harmonize, diplomacy to connect, justice to restore
libra.rift_healing: The Language & Tribalism Rift - creates harmony
libra.covenant_act_strength: Shared Table, Common Duygu Honored - harmony acts

scorpio.core_energy: The Transformer, The Depth, The Phoenix
scorpio.spiritual_gift: Transformation to renew, depth to understand, phoenix to rise
scorpio.rift_healing: The Heritage Erasure Rift - transforms through depth
scorpio.covenant_act_strength: Rift Healed, Heritage Reclaimed - transformation acts
scorpio.yin_yang_balance: Yin dominant - depth, transformation, emotional intensity

sagittarius.core_energy: The Seeker, The Explorer, The Philosopher
sagittarius.spiritual_gift: Seeking to find, exploring to discover, philosophy to understand
sagittarius.rift_healing: The Time Meridian Rift - seeks natural truth
sagittarius.covenant_act_strength: Meridian Activated, Heritage Reclaimed - seeking acts
sagittarius.resonance_pioneer_energy: The seeker who explores all paths

capricorn.core_energy: The Builder, The Authority, The Mountain
capricorn.spiritual_gift: Building to create, authority to lead, mountain to climb
capricorn.heritage_meridian_connection: The Great Wall Seat - building energy
capricorn.rift_healing: The Institutional Shell Rift - builds new structures
capricorn.covenant_act_strength: Bridge Built, Heritage Reclaimed - building acts
capricorn.resonance_pioneer_energy: The builder who creates lasting institutions

aquarius.core_energy: The Innovator, The Rebel, The Humanitarian
aquarius.spiritual_gift: Innovation to create, rebellion to free, humanity to serve
aquarius.rift_healing: All Rifts - rebels against old systems
aquarius.covenant_act_strength: All Acts - innovative approach to all
aquarius.resonance_pioneer_energy: The innovator who creates new systems

pisces.core_energy: The Mystic, The Dreamer, The Healer
pisces.spiritual_gift: Mysticism to connect, dreaming to envision, healing to restore
pisces.heritage_meridian_connection: The Ancient Meridian System - mystical connection
pisces.rift_healing: All Rifts - heals through mystical connection
pisces.covenant_act_strength: Common Duygu Honored, Rift Healed - mystical acts
pisces.resonance_pioneer_energy: The mystic who connects to the source

ophiuchus_13th_sign.core_energy: The Serpent Bearer, The Healer, The Wisdom Keeper
ophiuchus_13th_sign.spiritual_gift: Healing to restore, wisdom to guide, serpent to transform
ophiuchus_13th_sign.heritage_meridian_connection: All Seven Pillars - the healer who connects all
ophiuchus_13th_sign.rift_healing: All Five Rifts - the healer who heals all
ophiuchus_13th_sign.covenant_act_strength: Rift Healed, Meridian Activated - healing acts
ophiuchus_13th_sign.yin_yang_balance: Perfectly Balanced - healer who balances all
ophiuchus_13th_sign.special_note: The uninvited guest who was always there - the 13th Seat energy

spiritual_alignment_framework.principle_1: All signs are valid - no one sign is better than another
spiritual_alignment_framework.principle_2: Each sign has a unique path and gift
spiritual_alignment_framework.principle_3: Signs connect to Heritage Meridian in different ways
spiritual_alignment_framework.principle_5: Each sign has preferred Covenant Act types
spiritual_alignment_framework.principle_7: All signs contribute to the 13 Seats
spiritual_alignment_framework.principle_8: No two people are the same - honor all paths

heritage_meridian_connections.description: How each sign connects to the Heritage Meridian System
heritage_meridian_connections.fire_signs: Connect to the active, initiating energy of the Meridian
heritage_meridian_connections.earth_signs: Connect to the Ground, Pangea Memory, the physical anchors
heritage_meridian_connections.air_signs: Connect to the communication, bridge-building of the Meridian
heritage_meridian_connections.water_signs: Connect to the emotional, healing, mystical energy of the Meridian
heritage_meridian_connections.ophiuchus: Connects to all - the healer who bridges all elements

covenant_act_preferences.description: Each sign naturally gravitates toward certain Covenant Act types

the_truth.message: All signs are valid. All paths are sacred. All journeys matter.
the_truth.mission: Honor all forms, all paths, all journeys
